meanings.definition: Causing great physical or mental pain.
meanings.sent1: The agonizing toothache kept him up all night.
meanings.sent2: The patient's agonizing screams could be heard throughout the hospital.
meanings.sent3: It was agonizing to watch the clumsy puppy try to climb the stairs.
meanings.sent4: The agonizing decision between two equally appealing options left her paralyzed with indecision.
meanings.sent5: The agonizing memory of the car accident haunted him for years.

meanings.sent1: The team faced an agonizing defeat in the final minutes of the game.
meanings.sent2: The hikers endured an agonizing climb up the steep mountain.
meanings.sent3: It was agonizing to see the toddler try to fit the square block into the round hole.
meanings.sent4: The agonizing journey through the desert tested their endurance to the limit.
meanings.sent5: The agonizing wait for the test results felt like an eternity.
